Class PlayerShip

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFireObservable, IForwardThrustObservable, IHyperSpaceObservable, ILeftObservable, IObservable, IReverseThrustObservable, IRightObservable, IShape, IShieldObservable, IStopObservable

    public class PlayerShip
extends Ship
implements IFireObservable, IForwardThrustObservable, IReverseThrustObservable, ILeftObservable, IRightObservable, IStopObservable, IHyperSpaceObservable, IShieldObservable
    The Class PlayerShip represents player ship object.
